data.actual_result: You will see a grey box behind the text
data.expected_result: It will drag normally and will just show the category name with no box
data.short_description: An additional grey box comes up when dragging a category which is at the top of the list (left side).
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a Discord server where you are able to modify the channels - Create a new category (any name) - If not already, drag the category to the top of the list (where it lists all the categories and channels) - Now try dragging it somewhere else
